file_content.text: You will not defeat General... Faraire....
The last of the War Trust will be neutralized in no time.
Faraire is next.
You're in for... a surprise....
I would have spared you.
You didn't have to die.
A life in chains... is no... life....
You wasted your life. I will crush everything you have built.
You died for nothing.
Then I die a... broken man....
For... the... Repub....
General Durant, I've come for you.
I'm not hiding anymore, Sith. We delayed you long enough to achieve success.
We've stabilized the Siantide cells. Now the Republic has a new power source that gives us the advantage in this war.
I'm just here to take you out, Durant.
None of that matters to me.
Your Siantide cells can't be so powerful.
I'm not buying it.
You have no idea.
General Frellka and General Minst's sacrifices won't be in vain.
Tell me about these Siantide cells.
Enlighten me.
Imagine a common blaster rifle with the power of a turbolaser battery.
Upon returning to Taris after the Empire bombarded it, we discovered that all the flash-fire deaths created a strange residue.
Once radiated and solidified, it turned into a highly volatile but powerful energy source. Trouble was, we couldn't stabilize it. Until now.
None of this will do you any good.
Doesn't matter.
That's where you're wrong.
Where does this leave us?
And now what?
It leaves me with the upper hand.
Sounds like a lot of trouble.
Was it worth it?
We have risked much. And lost much.
General Minst told me everything right before I killed him.
I know all about it.
Minst and I served together for decades. He was a good man.
It pains me that he's gone, but his sacrifice won't be in vain. It has enabled your destruction.
General Minst told me everything when I captured him.
I know all about it.
Minst and I have served the Republic together most of our lives. He deserves better.
I ache to think of the horrors my fellow will face at the hands of the Empire.
This blaster is the prototype, powered by the smallest Siantide battery. You're about to see just how lethal it is. Everyone, attack.
